attributes.action: Say no to goverment giving people in prison ivf
attributes.additional_details:
I want there to be a stop of people in prison get ivf free!!
There are couples out there like myself who have to save£6000+ to have a baby through ivf yet it seems if your in prison you get it free.
There are in prison for a reason drug dealers, murderers etc.
The thought of this makes my blood boil knowing that if this happens knowing we have to save the money
What is the world coming too!!
Please help me stop this happening please.
Thank you

rejection.details: Please see: Stop Prisoners Getting IVF on the NHS
